mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ANALYSIS ( IDX_MEETING_USER_JOIN, JOY, SADNESS, DISGUST, CONTEMPT, ANGER, FEAR, SURPRISE, VALENCE, ENGAGEMENT, TIMESTAMP, FILENAME, SMILE, INNERBROWRAISE, BROWRAISE, BROWFURROW, NOSEWRINKLE, UPPERLIPRAISE, LIPCORNERDEPRESSOR, CHINRAISE, LIPPUCKER, LIPPRESS, LIPSUCK, MOUTHOPEN, SMIRK, EYECLOSURE, ATTENTION, LIDTIGHTEN, JAWDROP, DIMPLER, EYEWIDEN, CHEEKRAISE, LIPSTRETCH ) VALUES ( ( SELECT IDX_MEETING_USER_JOIN FROM TB_MEETING_USER_JOIN WHERE TOKEN = #{token} AND SESSIONID = #{mcid} ), #{joy}, #{sadness}, #{disgust}, #{contempt}, #{anger}, #{fear}, #{surprise}, #{valence}, #{engagement}, #{time_stamp}, #{FileName}, #{smile}, #{innerBrowRaise}, #{browRaise}, #{browFurrow}, #{noseWrinkle}, #{upperLipRaise}, #{lipCornerDepressor}, #{chinRaise}, #{lipPucker}, #{lipPress}, #{lipSuck}, #{mouthOpen}, #{smirk}, #{eyeClosure}, #{attention}, #{lidTighten}, #{jawDrop}, #{dimpler}, #{eyeWiden}, #{cheekRaise}, #{lipStretch} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_ANALYSIS WHERE IDX_MEETING=#{idx_meeting} ORDER BY TIMESTAMP ASC, IDX_ANALYSIS ASC

SELECT IDX_ANALYSIS, IDX_MEETING_USER_JOIN, TIMESTAMP, ENGAGEMENT, ATTENTION, VALENCE FROM TB_ANALYSIS WHERE 1=1
AND IDX_MEETING_USER_JOIN=#{idx_meeting_user_join}
AND IDX_MEETING_USER_JOIN=(SELECT IDX_MEETING_USER_JOIN FROM TB_MEETING_USER_JOIN WHERE IDX_MEETING=#{idx_meeting} AND IDX_USER=#{idx_user})
ORDER BY TIMESTAMP ASC
SELECT MIN(timestamp) AS TIMEFIRST, MAX(timestamp) AS TIMEEND FROM TB_ANALYSIS WHERE IDX_MEETING_USER_JOIN IN (SELECT IDX_MEETING_USER_JOIN FROM TB_MEETING_USER_JOIN WHERE IDX_MEETING=#{idx_meeting})
